name: openwhyd
description: A web app for collecting, playing and sharing music from various streaming platforms: Youtube, Soundcloud, Bandcamp, Vimeo, Deezer...

scripts.doc:serve: cd docs && gem install bundler && bundle install && bundle exec jekyll serve --incremental
scripts.postinstall: npm run -s donate; cp node_modules/playemjs/dist/playem-*.js public/js/
scripts.donate:
echo "
   *** Thanks for downloading Openwhyd! ***
Please consider donating to our open collective

 => https://opencollective.com/openwhyd/donate
"
scripts.forever:start: mv appd.out prev.out; mv appd.err prev.err; npx forever --outFile appd.out --errFile appd.err --minUptime 1000 --spinSleepTime 500 --number 100000 start app.js $@
scripts.forever:restart: npm run forever:stop; npm run forever:start $@;
scripts.test-api: npm run test-reset && npx mocha test/api/*.js --exit
scripts.test: . ./env-vars-testing.sh && npm run test-unit && npm run test-api && npm run test:cypress
scripts.docker:seed: docker-compose exec web npm run test-reset && docker-compose restart web && ./scripts/wait-for-http-server.sh 8080
scripts.docker:run: npm run docker:seed && docker-compose exec web npm run $@
scripts.docker:test: npm run docker:run test-unit && npm run docker:run test-api && npm run docker:test:cypress
